msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the papyrus is broken at the beginning of the column, at the middle and at the end of the names of the taxpayers as a result of three folds; yet the third fold caused a big lacuna and a few small holes. The bottom is broken, except for the payments; three lines are lost from the bottom. There is a kollesis is between the first and second folds. A dot of ink can be seen on verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.
